abstract: Wal-Mart is offering a selection of upcoming hardcover books for $10 on its Web site.
snippet: Wal-Mart is offering a selection of upcoming hardcover books for $10 on its Web site.
lead_paragraph: Wal-Mart is taking book price-cutting to a new level, offering consumers the chance to buy yet-to-be published hardcover books for just $10 apiece on the company’s Web site, Walmart.com. The retailer is pitching its new pricing as coming just in time for holiday gift-buying.

headline.main: Wal-Mart Offering Some Forthcoming Hardcovers for $10 on its Web Site
